generated_body: The article likely discusses the experiences of veterans who are pursuing graduate education and their efforts to support younger students in similar academic pursuits. It may highlight specific initiatives or programs where these veterans offer mentorship, guidance, or resources to help undergraduates navigate their educational journeys. Overall, readers can expect insights into the impact of this supportive network within the educational environment.
